entry.title: [EU][Customer Service] - Live Chat and calls incident notification
entry.content:
Jun 30, 06:58 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on our Customer Service has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 19/06/2025 13:28 UTC
End time : 19/06/2025 16:13 UTC
Service impact : Live Chat Cisco and calls were unreachable for customers.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jun 19, 16:13 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 19, 15:48 UTC
Update - Service impact : Calls are not operating normally. Some phone calls may be interrupted.

Jun 19, 15:44 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Jun 19, 15:31 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jun 19, 15:08 UTC
Update - Service impact : Some calls have degraded operation.
Customers impact : Some customers are experiencing degraded performance when calling Support.

Jun 19, 14:39 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Customer Service, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties.

Please find the details:
Start time : 19/06/2025 13:28 UTC
Service impact : Live Chat Cisco and calls are unreachable for customers.
Customers impact : Customers cannot access their Cisco live chat and the calls when want to join the Support.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.
Workaround : In order to join the Support, customers can create tickets via the Help Center.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Customer Service] - Control Panel, API and Corporate websites maintenance
entry.content:
Jun 10, 19:17 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Jun 10, 18:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Jun 5, 11:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Control Panel, API databases and and Corporate websites.

Start time : 10/06/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 10/06/2025 20:00 UTC
Service impact : During the scheduled maintenance window, it will not be possible to perform any procedures related to the deployment of KYC (Know Your Customer), including the creation of India accounts, the resetting of 2FA (Two-Factor Authentication), and GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation) requests. This will result in a 15-minute downtime for each Know Your Customer (KYC), totalling 45 minutes of unavailability.
Service improvement : This maintenance will optimise the stability of our KYC procedures.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [EU/CA][Customer service] API/Control panel/Order funnel degraded service
entry.content:
Apr 9, 10:13 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident on API/Control panel/Order funnel has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 09/04/2025 09:04 UTC
End time : 09/04/2025 09:15 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a network issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Apr 9, 09:50 UTC
Monitoring - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : 15% error rate on the Canadian Customer Panel, Canadian API, and Canadian Order funnel.
Abnormal error rate for European customers using Canadian services between 04/04/2025 09:04 UTC and 04/04/2025 09:10 UTC, followed by another one between 04/04/2025 09:15 UTC and 04/04/2025 09:15 UTC.
Ongoing Actions : Our technical team is monitoring the incident.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Apr 9, 09:17 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 09/04/2025 09:04 UTC
Service impact: High error rates and high response times have been detected on API impacting Customer Panel, OVHcloud API (eu.api.ovh.com, ca.api.ovh.com) and Order funnel.
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.
